categories: Toddler and child fleece, hoodies and Sweaters
description:
Offer your littlest hikers some serious UV protection. With its 40 UPF rating the Skylight Hoodie protects sensitive skin while wicking away moisture to keep your little beach bum cool. A roomy 2-panel hood adds extra protection, while the custom prints and colours amp up the fun.Slim fit keeps material to a minimum, allowing complete freedom.Active odour control lets you go a couple extra days between washes.UPF 40 blocks more than 97% of UV, great for long days in the sun.bluesign® approved poly spandex blend dries fast, wicks moisture and feels cool against the skin.Name label on the inside helps make the games of ‘whose is whose’ a bit easier.Flatlock seams are non-chafing.2-panel hood provides additional sun protection.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: MEC Skylight UPF Hoodie - Children
